Package kut

Class Opt<T>

java.lang.Object
kut.Opt<T>
public class Opt<T> extends Object
Package of a value that can be null.

    • bind

      public <U> Opt<U> bind(Function<T,Opt<U>> f)
      Returns the result of apply 'f' to the value of 'this'. If this is of type 'none', returns also an Opt of type 'none'.
      Type Parameters:
      U - Opt returned type.
      Parameters:
      f - Function to apply.
      Returns:
      Opt.

      Returns Opt 'JSONized' in 'js'.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of Opt element.
      Parameters:
      js - Opt 'JSONized'.
      eFromJs - Function to restore the element of the Opt 'JSONized' in 'js'.

    • toJs

      public static <T> String toJs(Opt<T> o, Function<T,String> eToJs)
      Returns JSON representation of 'o':

      "[]" for Opt.none() and
      "[JS-element]" for Opt.some(element).

      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of 'o' element.
      Parameters:
      o - Opt.
      eToJs - Function to 'JSONize' the element of 'o'.
      Returns:
      JSON representation of 'o'.
